title: Collaborative Digital Literacy Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with digital tools (ability to use smartphones/tablets)
context.additional_context: A course combining theory and practical tasks through mobile-based fragmented learning, with mandatory online collaboration tools for team projects

learning_goals: Learners complete information-sharing and feedback processes using online collaboration tools (Google Workspace, Padlet, etc.) with over 80% accuracy.
Utilizing digital content creation tools, learners participate in three or more team projects and generate collaborative outputs.
Applying critical digital information evaluation criteria, learners identify virtual disinformation with 90% accuracy.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
